The ship's mate said, "I have been impressed that this boat will go down with all hands on board ere long. I have felt so strongly exercised that I 


                                  -406- 

shall not, if I can possibly disconnect from it, continue to remain on the boat." . . . When I see as I do on this boat such disregard for God and for anything serious, I ask myself, What can be done? . . . My heart aches. . . .
